languages.text: "Приветствую, Ваша Светлость. Я — Пощада, распорядитель сего собрания достойных и предприимчивых. Ликование, что родилось в душе моей при вести о вашем визите, не омрачила даже строгая рать вопросов о том, как вышло, что интересы ваши пролегли столь близко к нашим, что мне дарована честь лицезреть вас на собрании высшего круга Миссии. Вопросы возникают и разрешаются, и мудрому не стоит омрачать ими сердце". {n}Мужчина дарит вам лучезарную улыбку.{/n}

"Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am Mercy, the organiser of this gathering of upstanding and enterprising men and women. The jubilation that was engendered in my soul at the news of your visit was not overshadowed even by the host of questions it raised — primarily, about how your interests came to lie in such close proximity to ours that I was granted the honour of seeing you at a meeting of the Mission's highest circle. Questions arise and are resolved, and the wise should not darken their hearts with them." {n}He gives you a radiant smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Приветствую, Ваша Светлость. Я — Пощада, распорядитель сего собрания достойных и предприимчивых. Ликование, что родилось в душе моей при вести о вашем визите, не омрачила даже строгая рать вопросов о том, как вышло, что интересы ваши пролегли столь близко к нашим, что мне дарована честь лицезреть вас на собрании высшего круга Миссии. Вопросы возникают и разрешаются, и мудрому не стоит омрачать ими сердце". {n}Мужчина дарит вам лучезарную улыбку.{/n}

languages.text: “向您致意，大人。我是悯慈，是这场聚会的组织者。我们这些遵纪守法、诚实进取的人们齐聚一堂，而您来访的消息，让我的心中充满了喜悦。与此同时，我的心中也浮现了一些问题。最主要的问题是：不知是出于什么原因，您的利益所在与我们的利益所在竟会如此接近，我竟然有幸能在组织最高层的会议上见到您。当然，有问题，也就会有解决方案，明智之人是不会为这些问题而心灰意冷的。”{n}他对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am Mercy, the organiser of this gathering of upstanding and enterprising men and women. The jubilation that was engendered in my soul at the news of your visit was not overshadowed even by the host of questions it raised — primarily, about how your interests came to lie in such close proximity to ours that I was granted the honour of seeing you at a meeting of the Mission's highest circle. Questions arise and are resolved, and the wise should not darken their hearts with them." {n}He gives you a radiant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，大人。我是悯慈，是这场聚会的组织者。我们这些遵纪守法、诚实进取的人们齐聚一堂，而您来访的消息，让我的心中充满了喜悦。与此同时，我的心中也浮现了一些问题。最主要的问题是：不知是出于什么原因，您的利益所在与我们的利益所在竟会如此接近，我竟然有幸能在组织最高层的会议上见到您。当然，有问题，也就会有解决方案，明智之人是不会为这些问题而心灰意冷的。”{n}他对你露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「ごきげんよう、陛下。私はマーシー、この誠実かつ進取の気性に富む男女の集まりの主催者です。貴殿のご訪問の報に接し、私の魂に沸き起こった歓喜は、その報によってもたらされた多くの疑問…主に、どのようにして貴殿のご関心が我々のそれとこれほどに近しくなり、聖務団の最高の会合で貴殿にお目にかかる栄誉を与えられたのかにも勝るものではありませんでした。疑問とは生じ、解決されるものであり、賢明な者は疑いで心を暗くしてはならないものですから」{n}彼は晴れやかな笑顔をあなたに向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am Mercy, the organiser of this gathering of upstanding and enterprising men and women. The jubilation that was engendered in my soul at the news of your visit was not overshadowed even by the host of questions it raised — primarily, about how your interests came to lie in such close proximity to ours that I was granted the honour of seeing you at a meeting of the Mission's highest circle. Questions arise and are resolved, and the wise should not darken their hearts with them." {n}He gives you a radiant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ごきげんよう、陛下。私はマーシー、この誠実かつ進取の気性に富む男女の集まりの主催者です。貴殿のご訪問の報に接し、私の魂に沸き起こった歓喜は、その報によってもたらされた多くの疑問…主に、どのようにして貴殿のご関心が我々のそれとこれほどに近しくなり、聖務団の最高の会合で貴殿にお目にかかる栄誉を与えられたのかにも勝るものではありませんでした。疑問とは生じ、解決されるものであり、賢明な者は疑いで心を暗くしてはならないものですから」{n}彼は晴れやかな笑顔をあなたに向ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «Saludos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy Mercy, el organizador de este encuentro entre prodigios del comercio. El júbilo que contiene mi alma por su llegada no se ha visto opacado ni siquiera por la cantidad de preguntas que me asaltan; sobre todo, por qué sus intereses han resultado coincidir en proximidad con los nuestros y cómo he es que he recibido el honor de verl{mf|o|a} en una congregación del círculo más alto de la Misión. Es natural que las preguntas surjan y se resuelvan; lo perjudicial es que los sabios oscurezcan sus corazones con ellas». {n}Te dedica una radiante sonrisa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am Mercy, the organiser of this gathering of upstanding and enterprising men and women. The jubilation that was engendered in my soul at the news of your visit was not overshadowed even by the host of questions it raised — primarily, about how your interests came to lie in such close proximity to ours that I was granted the honour of seeing you at a meeting of the Mission's highest circle. Questions arise and are resolved, and the wise should not darken their hearts with them." {n}He gives you a radiant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Soy Mercy, el organizador de este encuentro entre prodigios del comercio. El júbilo que contiene mi alma por su llegada no se ha visto opacado ni siquiera por la cantidad de preguntas que me asaltan; sobre todo, por qué sus intereses han resultado coincidir en proximidad con los nuestros y cómo he es que he recibido el honor de verl{mf|o|a} en una congregación del círculo más alto de la Misión. Es natural que las preguntas surjan y se resuelvan; lo perjudicial es que los sabios oscurezcan sus corazones con ellas». {n}Te dedica una radiante sonrisa.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Je suis Mercy, l'organisateur de ce rassemblement d'entrepreneurs et d'entrepreneuses des plus intègres. La joie qui s'est emparée de mon âme en apprenant votre visite n'a pas éclipsé la myriade de questions soulevées par celle-ci. J'aimerais notamment savoir comment vos intérêts se sont retrouvés proches des nôtres au point que vous nous fassiez l'honneur de votre présence à une réunion du plus haut cercle de la Mission. Les questions se posent et se résolvent, et les sages ne laissent pas leur cœur s'en obscurcir, » {n}ajoute-t-il en vous adressant un sourire radieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am Mercy, the organiser of this gathering of upstanding and enterprising men and women. The jubilation that was engendered in my soul at the news of your visit was not overshadowed even by the host of questions it raised — primarily, about how your interests came to lie in such close proximity to ours that I was granted the honour of seeing you at a meeting of the Mission's highest circle. Questions arise and are resolved, and the wise should not darken their hearts with them." {n}He gives you a radiant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Je suis Mercy, l'organisateur de ce rassemblement d'entrepreneurs et d'entrepreneuses des plus intègres. La joie qui s'est emparée de mon âme en apprenant votre visite n'a pas éclipsé la myriade de questions soulevées par celle-ci. J'aimerais notamment savoir comment vos intérêts se sont retrouvés proches des nôtres au point que vous nous fassiez l'honneur de votre présence à une réunion du plus haut cercle de la Mission. Les questions se posent et se résolvent, et les sages ne laissent pas leur cœur s'en obscurcir, » {n}ajoute-t-il en vous adressant un sourire radieux.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Seid gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin Mercy, Organisator dieser Zusammenkunft aufrechter und geschäftstüchtiger Männer und Frauen. Meine Freude, die die Nachricht Eures Besuch in mir auslöste, wurde trotz vieler ungeklärter Fragen nicht getrübt – Fragen vor allem, wie es dazu kam, dass Eure Interessen unsere eigenen so dermaßen tangieren, dass mir die besondere Ehre zufiel, Euch bei einem Treffen des einflussreichsten Kreises der Mission zu begrüßen. Fragen ergeben sich und müssen geklärt werden, und die Weisen lassen ihre Herzen nicht von ihnen verdunkeln." {n}Er lächelt dich strahlend an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am Mercy, the organiser of this gathering of upstanding and enterprising men and women. The jubilation that was engendered in my soul at the news of your visit was not overshadowed even by the host of questions it raised — primarily, about how your interests came to lie in such close proximity to ours that I was granted the honour of seeing you at a meeting of the Mission's highest circle. Questions arise and are resolved, and the wise should not darken their hearts with them." {n}He gives you a radiant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seid gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich bin Mercy, Organisator dieser Zusammenkunft aufrechter und geschäftstüchtiger Männer und Frauen. Meine Freude, die die Nachricht Eures Besuch in mir auslöste, wurde trotz vieler ungeklärter Fragen nicht getrübt – Fragen vor allem, wie es dazu kam, dass Eure Interessen unsere eigenen so dermaßen tangieren, dass mir die besondere Ehre zufiel, Euch bei einem Treffen des einflussreichsten Kreises der Mission zu begrüßen. Fragen ergeben sich und müssen geklärt werden, und die Weisen lassen ihre Herzen nicht von ihnen verdunkeln." {n}Er lächelt dich strahlend an.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Selamlarımı sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ben bu namuslu ve girişimci insanlar topluluğunun organizatörüyüm. Ziyaretinizin ruhumda doğurduğu sevince, bu ziyaretin akıllara getirdiği sayısız soru bile gölge düşüremiyor. Bunların başında da çıkarlarınızın bizimkilerle, sizi Misyon'un bu en üst kademelerinin oluşturduğu grubun toplantısında görme onuruna nail olmama sebep olacak kadar yakınlaşması geliyor. Sorular akıllara gelip sonrasında cevaplanır. Aklı olanlar, kalplerini bu sorularla karartmaz." {n}Göz alıcı bir şekilde sana gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am Mercy, the organiser of this gathering of upstanding and enterprising men and women. The jubilation that was engendered in my soul at the news of your visit was not overshadowed even by the host of questions it raised — primarily, about how your interests came to lie in such close proximity to ours that I was granted the honour of seeing you at a meeting of the Mission's highest circle. Questions arise and are resolved, and the wise should not darken their hearts with them." {n}He gives you a radiant smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Selamlarımı sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ben bu namuslu ve girişimci insanlar topluluğunun organizatörüyüm. Ziyaretinizin ruhumda doğurduğu sevince, bu ziyaretin akıllara getirdiği sayısız soru bile göle düşüremiyor. Bunların başında da, çıkarlarınızın bizimkilerle, sizi Misyon'un bu en üst kademelerinin oluşturduğu grubun toplantısında görme onuruna nail olmama sebep olacak kadar nasıl yakınlaştığı geliyor. Sorular akıllara gelir ve sonra da çözülürler, aklı olanlar kalplerini bu sorularla karartmazlar." {n}Sana göz alıcı bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy
